original_text: Pharaoh sent his men to see what had happened. They saw that not one of the animals of the Israelites was dead! But Pharaoh's mind was still hard. He did not let the people go.
korean_text: 바로가 사람을 보내어 본즉 이스라엘의 가축은 하나도 죽지 아니하였더라 그러나 바로의 마음이 완강하여 백성을 보내지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh sent his men to see
not one of the animals of the Israelites was dead
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들의 동물 중 하나도 죽지 않았다는 것을

sentences.original_text: But Pharaoh's mind was still hard
He did not let the people go
